title: Ayaz Sadiq meets Speaker Balochistan Assembly
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jun 30 (APP): Speaker National Assembly Sardar Ayaz Sadiq on Monday met with Speaker Balochistan Assembly Captain (Retd) Abdul Khaliq Khan Achakzai at Parliament House.
The two dignitaries discussed the overall political and economic situation of the country, along with matters of mutual interest.
During the meeting, Ayaz Sadiq stressed the importance of strong coordination between the federal government and all provincial administrations in addressing the country’s ongoing challenges.
“Close cooperation between the federation and the provinces is essential for overcoming national issues,” he said.
Highlighting the strategic significance of Balochistan, the Speaker NA said, “Balochistan is a vital province, and the country’s development is closely linked with the development of the province.”
He reaffirmed the federal government’s commitment to the progress of the province, saying that Balochistan’s development remains among the top priorities of the current government.
The National Assembly Secretariat, he assured, would extend every possible assistance to enhance the capacity and performance of Balochistan Assembly members and staff.
Meanwhile, Khaliq Achakzai emphasized the need to strengthen inter-parliamentary ties, saying, “Enhanced interaction between members of the National Assembly and the Balochistan Assembly is vital for promoting harmony and mutual understanding.”
He also underscored the importance of national unity and solidarity, saying that these are indispensable for tackling the pressing challenges facing the country.
